summary: THE REAR DIFFERENTIAL FAILED FOR THE SECOND TIME.  VEHICLE HAS 83000 MILES.  THE LAST REPAIR USED AFTER MARKET PARTS.  THE PARTS COMPANY WILL NOT WARRANT CLAIMING IMPROPER INSTALLATION.  DEALER CLAIMS DESIGN DEFECT.  THIS PROBLEM HAS BEEN VERY FRUSTRATING.  SAME THING HAPPENED TO MY 1997 TAHOE AT 70K MILES.    *NLM
